summary: A retexture of San\'s Spiced Wine, a classier, unique look for a classy, unique wine.
descriptionHtml:
===== San\'s Spiced Wine Redesigned =====
made by HitokiriGensai

This is a retexture of San\'s Spiced Wine. To me, the original looked pretty uninspired, so I did a quick design of my own. The resolution is still the same, so it\'s not technically HD, but I did add some detail to the normal map.

===== Installation
Extract \'Textures\' folder into Skyrim\\Data, click \'yes\' to overwrite and/or merge folders.

===== Uninstallation
Delete files \"sanspicedwine.dds\" and \"sanspicedwine_n.dds\" in the Data\\textures\\clutter\\wine folder.

===== Conflicts
None. This only replaces the San\'s Spice Wine label texture, not the wine bottle texture, so it\'s compatible with mods that improve the appearance of the bottles.


This is officially my first uploaded mod. Give me any feedback you might have!

Artwork by HitokiriGensai
Thanks to Bethesda
author: HitokiriGensai
